sourcesContent:
export const Team = (props) => { return (

{props.data ? props.data.data.titleTeam : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.paragraphTeam : ''}

{props.data ? props.data.data.team.map((d, i) => (

{d.name}

{d.job}
{d.twitter === "" ? "" : } {d.facebook === "" ? "" : } {d.instagram === "" ? "" : } {d.linkedin === "" ? "" : }
)) : 'Loading...'}
) }
